projects.title: Pet Clinic
projects.bodyText:
- Microservice based business application for a pet clinic which is divided into teams, requiring communication and teamwork to have it all come together.
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Was responsible for the service of billing within the microservice, troubleshooting, updating, debugging issues, working with front-end and back-end.

projects.title: Halal Bites
projects.bodyText:
- Website/microservice based system for halal/kosher restaurants owners to easily have clients go to one location to find them. 
 - We were in constant contact with our product owner for this project, who told us exactly what he wanted it to do and look like. 
 - The responsiblity of our tasks were seperated in a variety of ways during this project. Each memeber of the team had to have done a full stack story by the end of each sprint during development.

projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Website based application focus on front-end, developed using React, CSS and HTML. 
 - A minimalist design that best represents me, and the beginning of my journey in the industry. 
 - The concept behind my design is that as I grow in the industry so will my portfolio, this will be a on going project of mine.
